item.title: About Me
item.description:
I am a Software Engineer with many years’ experience. This is a little place that I organize my knowledge and skills, and express my technical ideas as well. Thanks for stopping by!

Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or GitHub.

Currently, I am Master’s Degree AUT student in New Zealand and looking for an internship opportunity in Auckland for my summer holiday (Nov. 2025 – Feb. 2026). Thanks in advance.
